name: a Test on the Beach
description:
An introspective and relaxing experience, a personality test set on a quiet beach that lets you see what you Inner Self looks like!

Your Inner Self design is based on your answers and it's 100%  scientifically accurate.

Also features a dress up mini game: buy your Inner Self something cool to wear!

-------
Many thanks to Fe for beta-testing!
-------

Audio credits - all sounds are from freesound.org, made by the following artists:
Benjamin Mastripolito (https://benpm.github.io), audioninja001, bone666138, squashy555, InspectorJ
